CustomField.formula: IF(Calculate_Run_Dock_and_Depot_Area__c, IF(ISBLANK(Case_Business_Name__c),'','Business Name: ' & Case_Business_Name__c & BR()) & IF(OR(AND(CONTAINS(Subject, 'Redirection'), CONTAINS(Subject, 'Check Address')), AND(ISBLANK(Case_Address_Line__c), ISBLANK(Case_Address_Suburb__c), ISBLANK(Case_Address_State__c), ISBLANK(Case_Address_Postcode__c))),'','Delivery Address: ' & IF(OR( CONTAINS(Subject, 'Redirection'), CONTAINS(Subject, 'Check Address')),Case_Address_Line__c & ', ' & Case_Address_Suburb__c & ', ' & Case_Address_State__c & ', ' & Case_Address_Postcode__c, 'n/a') & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Case_Phone__c),'','Phone: ' & Case_Phone__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Case_Delivery_Collection_Date__c),'','Delivery/Collection Date: ' & IF(ISNULL(Case_Delivery_Collection_Date__c) , '', TEXT(Day(Case_Delivery_Collection_Date__c)) & '/' & TEXT(MONTH(Case_Delivery_Collection_Date__c)) & '/' & TEXT(YEAR(Case_Delivery_Collection_Date__c))) & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Case_Delivery_Instructions__c),'','Delivery Instructions: ' & Case_Delivery_Instructions__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Case_ATL_Instructions__c),'','ATL Instructions: ' & Case_ATL_Instructions__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Case_Other_ATL_Instructions__c),'',IF(LEFT(Case_ATL_Instructions__c,5) = 'Other', 'Other ATL Instructions: ' & Case_Other_ATL_Instructions__c & BR(), '')) & IF(ISBLANK(Case_Authorization_Origin__c),'','Authorization Origin: ' & Case_Authorization_Origin__c), 'n/a' )
CustomField.label: Manage Delivery Details
